availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander Thomas P'Pool (Caldwell County, Ky, farmer and farm manager)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and farm manager. Virginia native. Son of Sarah P'Pool. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned four enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1850. Farm manager in Caldwell County in 1860. Household owned six enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 359B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 783
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Pollards Tan Yard, p. 152.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Pollards Tan Yard, p. 217A.
"Alexander Thomas P.Pool (1824-1864)," Find A Grave, Memorial #99153631, accessed September 23, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/99153631.
